item.title: Crash after the 3 head monster killed
item.dc:creator: Jenova19
item.description:
copycat10:

Hello.

Just when i transfer from the map bm_c1a4b it crash.
Joint the minidumb.

Thanks for this awesome game !

Please add the most recent Minidump (.mdmp) file as an attachment to your post.

Minidump (.mdmp) files can be found here:

"..\SteamApps\{ACCOUNTNAME}\source sdk base 2007\"

Make sure to use “getpos” (without “”) in the console, just before the crash happens (the console must be enabled).

Usually “getpos” spits out something like this:

setpos -123.012345 1234.5678901 1234.012345;setang 0.123456 123.456789 0.000000

To enable the console, do this:

Jenova19:

-Snip-

[i]

  1. Close Black Mesa.
  2. Open Steam.
  3. Browse to the Library (All Games).
  4. Right click “Black Mesa”.
  5. Click “Properties” (on the bottom of the menu).
  6. Click “Set Launch Options…”.
  7. Type “-dev -console” (without “”).
  8. Click “OK”.
  9. Close the “Black Mesa - Properties” window.
  10. Start the game.

[/i]

Uploading and linking a screenshot of the spot, just before it crashes (right after using the “getpos” command), would be really helpful, as well.
